= OWL Axiomatization =

The OWL axioms for HP are in the [http://phenotype-ontologies.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/ontology/hp/ src/ontology/hp] directory on this site.

The structure is analagous to that of the [MP].
 
 
= Status =

The OWL axiomatization is updated frequently to stay in sync with changes in the MP
